mapper.select:
select count(MACHINE_SEQ) from MACHINE_TB where 1=1 AND STATE != 'D'
and date_format(MACHINE_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
and CE_YN = 1 and RE_YN = 1 and ESD_YN = 1 and RS_YN = 1 and EFT_YN = 1 and SURGE_YN = 1 and CS_YN = 1 and MFLD_YN = 1 and VDIP_YN = 1 and CTI_YN = 1

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MACHINE_TB.DIS_ORDR, MACHINE_SEQ) AS no, MACHINE_SEQ, name, model, MNFCT_CMPNY, MNFCT_SERIAL, ifnull(date_format(REFORM_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') reformDtStr, REFORM_PERIOD from MACHINE_TB where 1=1 AND STATE != 'D'
and date_format(MACHINE_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
and CE_YN = 1 and RE_YN = 1 and ESD_YN = 1 and RS_YN = 1 and EFT_YN = 1 and SURGE_YN = 1 and CS_YN = 1 and MFLD_YN = 1 and VDIP_YN = 1 and CTI_YN = 1
order by no desc LIMIT #{pageUnit} OFFSET #{firstIndex};
